title: Disable Request: Open Shop click from fountain
body: I play a lot of ARAM and there are many times you fight around fountain and shop.  Could there be an option to toggle in order to open the shop from the map?  I always use the "Open to Buy" Keyboard key "P" anyways  I end up screwing up a lot of fights because I open up shop, mid nexus defense.

replies.body: Has anyone found a way to disable it ? I have the same issue in aram.
i have this issue when i play zoe and im defending, one r and bam theres the shop page and im now dead because the shop opened and i couldnt respond fast enough
I'm glad you understood the problem.  If anyone runs into it they probably brush it off.  I just don't ever click shop to buy  so it would be a nice option to toggle it for me.
How? I don't think anyone else has ever had this problem?
